Description: Funerary papyrus containing First and Second Book of Breathing (abridged version) written in hieratic script. Text on recto and verso.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 114-116, pls. 86-89.
Bibliographic references: Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.114-116, pls.86-89) (Designates both fragments EA 71513A)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57960) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57960)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: brittle, dark Black ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: 3m scotch magic tape 810 Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
